original_text: Therefore the Lord rejected all the people of Israel; he afflicted them and gave them into the hands of plunderers, until he thrust them from his presence.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘의 온 족속을 버리사 괴롭게 하시며 노략꾼의 손에 넘기시고 마침내 그의 앞에서 쫓아내시니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore the Lord rejected all the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 주님께서 이스라엘 모든 백성을 버리셨다

sentences.original_text: and gave them into the hands of plunderers
until he thrust them from his presence
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 자신의 앞에서 내쫓을 때까지
